name: gpupixel
description: Real-time image filter engine based on GPU
readme_summary: GPUPixel is a high-performance, cross-platform C++ library for real-time image and video filtering. It leverages OpenGL/ES to provide a wide range of effects, including beauty filters, and is compatible with iOS, Android, Mac, Windows, and Linux.
key_features: Real-time image and video filtering
Cross-platform compatibility (iOS, Android, Mac, Win, Linux)
C++11 and OpenGL/ES based
Beauty filters and face manipulation
Small footprint
primary_use_case: Enabling real-time image and video processing with advanced filters on various platforms, particularly for mobile applications requiring beauty effects.
cover_image_prompt: A vibrant, stylized artist's palette where instead of paint, glowing streams of digital data representing images and video are being manipulated by a sleek, futuristic brush. The brush, subtly branded with 'GPUPixel', is applying dazzling filters like sparkling light effects and subtle facial enhancements to the digital streams. In the background, small, abstract representations of mobile phones and laptops show the filtered output. The overall mood is dynamic and creative, with a clean, modern aesthetic, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with bright, engaging colors.

name: MetaRadar
description: A tool for BLE environment monitoring. Find and track Bluetooth devices around, and get notified when the target device is detected.
readme_summary: MetaRadar is an Android application designed for monitoring and analyzing Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) environments. It allows users to scan for BLE devices, track their presence, analyze their GATT services, and receive real-time alerts for suspicious or trackable devices.
key_features: Scan, analyze, and track Bluetooth devices
Create flexible filters for device detection
Deep analysis of scanned BLE devices via GATT services
GATT services Explorer
Define device type by metadata
Define approximate distance to devices
Offline operation, no data sharing or geolocation
primary_use_case: Real-time monitoring and analysis of the Bluetooth Low Energy environment for security research, personal investigation, and understanding device privacy.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant lighthouse keeper on a rocky shore, scanning the sea with a powerful, glowing radar dish. The radar sweeps across a dark ocean, highlighting small, distinct icons representing Bluetooth devices. Some icons glow red, indicating trackable devices, while others glow green, signifying privacy-conscious devices. The lighthouse itself has subtle digital circuit patterns. In the background, a small, stylized Android phone screen displays a simplified radar interface with the 'MetaRadar' name. The scene is dramatic with a focus on the scanning beam and the contrasting device icons, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a cool, blue and orange color palette.

name: auto-subs
description: Instantly generate AI-powered subtitles on your device. Works standalone or connects to DaVinci Resolve.
readme_summary: AutoSubs is a desktop application that automatically generates subtitles for audio and video files using AI. It offers both a standalone mode for any media file and integration with DaVinci Resolve, featuring a user-friendly interface, speaker diarization, and customizable subtitle styling.
key_features: One-click installer for Windows, macOS, and Linux
Standalone mode for transcribing any audio/video file
DaVinci Resolve integration
New, cleaner UI with faster performance and lower memory usage
Accurate transcription with speaker diarization and labeling
Advanced subtitle editing and speaker styling options
Support for multiple languages and translation
primary_use_case: Automatically generating accurate, customizable subtitles for video and audio content, with seamless integration into professional video editing workflows like DaVinci Resolve.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic robot with a microphone for a head, standing in a cozy studio. The robot is holding a tablet displaying a waveform, and from its microphone-head, streams of glowing, organized text are flowing into a video player screen in front of it, clearly forming subtitles. Subtle digital particles representing speech are visible in the air. The background shows a blurred DaVinci Resolve interface. The overall mood is efficient and creative, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The image should be a 3D isometric illustration with soft, warm lighting and a focus on clarity and ease of use.

name: x-ui-pro
description: XUI-PRO nginx reverse proxy with ws/grpc/httpupgrade/splithttp,xray protocol support: vless,vmess,trojan,shadowsocks panel cloudflare ssl,xtls,ssr,v2fly,v2ray installer bypass restrictions sing-box,shadowtls,reality,tunnel,gfw tor warp wireguard geoip tuic clash vpn mihomo psiphon hy2 oneclick argo bbr wstunnel anticensorship‚ö°üõ°Ô∏è
readme_summary: XUI-PRO is a shell script that automates the installation and configuration of a secure web proxy server. It integrates various tools like Nginx, Xray, V2rayA, Cloudflare, and Tor to provide a robust solution for bypassing internet restrictions and enhancing network security.
key_features: Automated installation script for web proxy server
Supports WebSocket/GRPC/HttpUpgrade/XHTTP via Nginx
Multiple user and domain support on port 443
Auto SSL renewal and daily service reloads
Automatic daily backups of x-ui.db
Admin Web Panel (X-UI Xray / V2rayA)
Cloudflare CDN/IP compatibility
Tor/Psiphon country changer
Random fake HTML templates for obfuscation
Support for various protocols: vless, vmess, trojan, shadowsocks, etc.
Bypass restrictions using tools like sing-box, reality, tunnel, gfw, tor, warp, wireguard, geoip, tuic, clash, vpn, mihomo, psiphon, hy2, oneclick, argo, bbr, wstunnel, anticensorship
primary_use_case: To provide an easy-to-install and highly configurable web proxy solution for bypassing internet censorship and restrictions, while offering enhanced security and obfuscation features.
cover_image_prompt: A digital wizard, labeled 'XUI-PRO', stands at a crossroads of internet traffic. One path is blocked by a stylized 'Great Firewall' of digital bricks. The wizard uses a multi-faceted crystal orb (representing Nginx and various protocols) to refract and redirect the traffic, creating secure, glowing tunnels that bypass the firewall. On one side, data streams are being filtered and rerouted through a 'Cloudflare' cloud, while on the other, a 'Tor' onion and a 'Psiphon' fan subtly indicate anonymity and country-hopping. The output is a clean, fast stream of data flowing freely towards a user's device. The style is a vibrant 3D isometric illustration with glowing data particles and subtle UI elements integrated into the wizard's robes.

name: persepolis
description: Persepolis is a download manager written in Python.
readme_summary: Persepolis is a free and open-source download manager written in Python, designed for multiple operating systems including GNU/Linux, BSD, macOS, and Windows. It offers advanced features for efficient file downloading.
key_features: Multi-segment downloading (up to 64 connections)
Download scheduling
Download queuing
Downloading videos from YouTube and other platforms
Cross-platform compatibility (GNU/Linux, BSD, macOS, Windows)
primary_use_case: Efficiently managing and accelerating file downloads through a graphical user interface.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, powerful water faucet with multiple segmented streams of water, each labeled with a connection icon, rapidly filling a large digital container. The water streams are vibrant blue, representing data flow. Subtle glowing lines connect the faucet to a small, clean interface displaying download progress bars and queues. The background is a clean, modern workspace with a soft glow. The overall mood is efficient and organized. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style, emphasizing clarity and speed, with the name 'Persepolis' subtly integrated into the faucet's design.
